item.title: Setting up my website enviroment
item.description: This write-up is about how I set up my repo, travis ci and docker container to work on my portfolio. Content Kick-off Docker Hugo Linking Github Pages Conclusion Kick-off Create and open a new project folder mkdir -p ~/portfolio cd ~/portfolio Docker Install docker (refer to the Arch Wiki ¯\(ツ)/¯ ) sudo pacman -S docker Creating docker image Alpine Linux is used as the base image FROMalpine:latestRUN apk add --no-cache \ curl \ git \ openssh-client \ rsync \ bash \ hugoENV VERSION=0.
